body.p: The petition of the bearer I am satisfied correctly sets forth the facts upon which he hopes for your clemency and which I trust you will regard as sufficient to justify you in granting this prayer.
I am informed and believe that Mr. Kelly is a quiet, industrious, & good citizen, & it would certainly fall heavely on him to be compelled to discharge the obligation imposed on him by his bond.

I am, -- Sir,
Respectfully Your Obt Sert
R. McKee
W. N. Haldeman
